comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end - I have the same filtering in FF as in Chrome. What certificate is used in the browser?
Try to clear update the filters, clear browser data, restart it and open the site.
You can also updata the AdGuard app to nightly channel and see how it goes. But before doing that, also make settings backup.
